com.rrs.corona.solutionsacceleratorstudio.license
Class LicenseFileIO

java.lang.Object
  com.rrs.corona.solutionsacceleratorstudio.license.LicenseFileIO

public class LicenseFileIO
extends java.lang.Object

This class write and read into License.xml information such as the user name, number of time SAS is used and total usage time of SAS.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Debadatta Mishra

          license is an Jaxb static object, which hold the information such as User name, User Accepted the License Aggrement or not, Total number of time the user used the SAS and Total Usage time.

license is an Jaxb static object, which hold the information such as User name, User Accepted the License Aggrement or not, Total number of time the user used the SAS and Total Usage time.

Method Detail

getInstance

public static LicenseFileIO getInstance()
Method used to obtain an instance of LicenseFileIO object

Returns:
an object of type LicenseFileIO

read

public void read(java.io.File licenseFile)
This calss read the content of the License.xml file and set in the license static object. Then this static object can be used, when we are checking that user is accepted the license or not, to calculate total time of usage and number of time used informations in other part of program.

Parameters:
licenseFile - File path of License.xml file

save

public void save(java.io.File licenseFile)
This method recievs the File path of License.xml file. This method updates the License.xml file by a) creating an new Time tag enclosing the start and end time of this session. b) updating TotalUsage tag with value obtained by addition of previous value present in the TotalUsage tag, with total usage time of this session. *

Parameters:
licenseFile - File path of License.xml file.

calculaeUsagTime

public java.lang.Long calculaeUsagTime()
This method calculate the Total usage of this session and return the calculated total usage time to the called function. This method clculate the Total usage time from the Session start and End time from license static object.

Returns:
returns the total usage of the session.
